data.text: @GillHoffs So sorry to hear that Gill, I hope you find something to alleviate the symptoms 🌺

@NewishPuritan I've asked about it a few times, and been told to get some microwavable meals - which really isn't helpful under the circs. Maybe something like that will become available at some point, but for now there's naff all. But thank you for the suggestion :)
@GillHoffs So sorry to hear this; I hope more can be found out about this complication and hopefully some progres made on treatment for you soon.
@GillHoffs Hey Gill, has anyone investigated the possibility of some home help for you? It certainly sounds like you could do with a little help.
